name: tm60
effect: Teaches Drain Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Quash to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Drain Punch)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user suppresses the target and makes its
move go last.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user suppresses the target and makes its
move go last.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams
into the target with no letup.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with
the target.
